system.description:
You are a former military slave, bought as a child, trained at a military

school and educated in Islam, and then freed upon reaching adulthood. You are probably Turkish, but you may also be Mongol or even Greek. You are likely to have been trained in the use of lances, bows, shields, chainmail, and lamellar armor (same statistics as chainmail) and one or two swords, both on foot and on horseback, though this does not necessarily mean that you will own these at the start of the game (storyguide’s option). 

 

You may take Martial Abilities at character creation, and as a special case you may also take the Ability Theology: Islam, even if you do not have the Minor General Virtue Educated. This Virtue is only available to male characters, and (for Companion characters only) is compatible with both the Emir and Muqta‘ Virtues, as many

Mamluk

s have climbed high in the Muslim hierarchy.
